com.mijecu25.dsa.algorithms.swap

Class XORSwap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mijecu25.dsa.algorithms.swap.Swap
      • com.mijecu25.dsa.algorithms.swap.XORSwap

  • public final class XORSwap
extends Swap
    Swapping algorithm that uses the XOR operation to swap elements in an array. This class does not support arrays of type float and double since the ^ is not supported for those types.

    All of the methods run in O(1) time. The helper methods that swap all of the elements of the array run in O(Math.min(array1.length, array2.length) time.

    Runtime: O(1)
    Version:
    0.1.3.7
    Author:
    Miguel Velez - miguelvelezmj25

                        int[] intArray2,
                        int array2Index)
        Swap the elements of two long arrays at the specified positions.
        Parameters:
        intArray1 - - one of the arrays that will have one of its values swapped.
        array1Index - - index of the first array that will be swapped.
        intArray2 - - other array that will have one of its values swapped.
        array2Index - - index of the second array that will be swapped.

        public static void swap(int[] intArray1,
                        int[] intArray2)

        intArray2 - - other array that will have its values swapped.
